metadata.project_name: Agent Teams Starter Kit — Full Upgrade

work_areas.title: Kickoff & Onboarding
work_areas.description: Help users actually start using Agent Teams

work_areas.title: WBS Templates
work_areas.description: Ready-to-use project patterns for common use cases

work_areas.title: Skills Expansion
work_areas.description: Additional skills for common agent operations

work_areas.title: Documentation & Playbooks
work_areas.description: Guides for team patterns, error recovery, best practices

work_areas.title: AI-Optimized Template Substrate
work_areas.description: Deliver a production-ready, AI-native web app skeleton with strict type and policy guardrails.

packets.title: Create lead agent kickoff prompt
packets.scope: Write prompts/kickoff-lead.md — example prompt for starting a lead agent session. Include: how to reference CLAUDE.md, how to init WBS, how to spawn teammates. Make it copy-pasteable.

packets.title: Create teammate kickoff prompt
packets.scope: Write prompts/kickoff-teammate.md — example prompt the lead uses to spawn a specialist. Include: how to pass context, which skills to use, how to report back.

packets.title: Create 2-minute quickstart guide
packets.scope: Write prompts/QUICKSTART.md — absolute minimum steps to go from clone to working Agent Team. Target: under 2 minutes to first claimed packet.

packets.title: Create feature development WBS template
packets.scope: Write templates/wbs-feature.json — standard pattern for building a new feature. Phases: requirements, design, implement, test, document. 8-12 packets.

packets.title: Create migration WBS template
packets.scope: Write templates/wbs-migration.json — pattern for migrating systems/code. Phases: audit, plan, execute incrementally, validate, cutover. Include rollback considerations.

packets.title: Create refactor WBS template
packets.scope: Write templates/wbs-refactor.json — pattern for systematic refactoring. Phases: identify scope, add tests, refactor incrementally, validate. Emphasis on not breaking things.

packets.title: Create bug campaign WBS template
packets.scope: Write templates/wbs-bugfix.json — pattern for tackling multiple bugs systematically. Phases: triage, reproduce, fix, verify. Good for 'fix all the linter errors' type work.

packets.title: Create code review skill
packets.scope: Write .claude/skills/review-code/SKILL.md — skill for reviewing code changes. Include: what to look for, how to report findings, severity levels. Should work with git diff.

packets.title: Create test runner skill
packets.scope: Write .claude/skills/run-tests/SKILL.md — skill for running tests and interpreting results. Handle: pytest, jest, go test. Report pass/fail clearly.

packets.title: Create PR skill
packets.scope: Write .claude/skills/create-pr/SKILL.md — skill for creating pull requests. Include: title conventions, description template, linking to WBS packets.

packets.title: Create research/explore skill
packets.scope: Write .claude/skills/explore/SKILL.md — skill for exploring unfamiliar codebases. Include: how to summarize findings, what to document, how to report back to lead.

packets.title: Create WBS report skill
packets.scope: Write .claude/skills/wbs-report/SKILL.md — skill for generating markdown summary of project status. Include: progress stats, completed work, blockers, next steps.

packets.title: Write team patterns guide
packets.scope: Write docs/TEAM_PATTERNS.md — document common team structures: lead + specialists, parallel workers, pipeline. When to use each. How many agents for different project sizes.

packets.title: Write error recovery playbook
packets.scope: Write docs/PLAYBOOK.md — what to do when things go wrong. Scenarios: agent stuck, wrong work done, dependency failed, need to restart. Step-by-step recovery procedures.

packets.title: Write WBS design guide
packets.scope: Write docs/DESIGNING_WBS.md — how to break down a project into good packets. Sizing guidance, dependency patterns to avoid, common mistakes.

packets.title: Add colored CLI output
packets.scope: Update .governance/wbs_cli.py to use ANSI colors. Green for success, red for errors, yellow for warnings, blue for info. Detect if terminal supports colors.

packets.title: Add dashboard auto-refresh
packets.scope: Update .governance/static/index.html to auto-refresh every 5 seconds (already has setInterval, verify it works). Add visual indicator showing last refresh time.

packets.title: Add GitHub Actions CI
packets.scope: Create .github/workflows/test.yml — run test.sh on push and PR. Add badge to README. Simple workflow, just validates the system works.

packets.title: Add README badges and screenshot
packets.scope: Update README.md with badges (license, CI, Python version). Add screenshot or GIF of dashboard. Make it visually appealing at first glance.

packets.title: Final review and cleanup
packets.scope: Review all new files for consistency. Update README if needed. Ensure .meta/ is documented as 'delete before publishing'. Run full test suite. Tag as v1.0.

packets.title: Pin framework baseline and runtime policy
packets.scope: Define Next.js 16 baseline with pinned patch policy, server/client boundary rules, caching strategy defaults, and runtime targets. Output: architecture decision doc and enforced config updates in template defaults.

packets.title: Design data layer: Prisma default with adapter seam
packets.scope: Define PostgreSQL + Supabase integration pattern with Prisma as default ORM, documented Drizzle swap seam, and canonical connection strategy. Output: data-layer ADR and starter implementation contract.

packets.title: Define authorization model: RLS-first plus app policy
packets.scope: Establish authorization contract with Postgres RLS as enforcement source of truth and app-layer policy checks for UX capability gating. Output: auth architecture spec and starter policy module interface.

packets.title: Implement substrate scaffold package
packets.scope: Build scaffold baseline for Next.js App Router, Tailwind, shadcn/ui primitives, Zod validation, and strict TypeScript defaults. Output: runnable template skeleton with seed pages and examples.

packets.title: Create typed context artifacts for AI agents
packets.scope: Produce canonical context bundle including schema.prisma conventions, Zod contract layout, env schema, and agent-facing context index. Output: docs and starter files that minimize model ambiguity.

packets.title: Add quality gates and AI guardrails
packets.scope: Add CI checks and local gates for typecheck, lint, test, schema validation, and policy drift detection. Output: repeatable verification pipeline and failure playbook references.

packets.title: Build AI-task eval harness
packets.scope: Implement scripted eval scenarios to measure one-shot success for CRUD, auth checks, and schema edits by AI agents. Output: eval scripts, scoring rubric, and baseline report format.

packets.title: Write migration and adoption playbook
packets.scope: Document migration path from existing templates to the new substrate, including decision criteria and rollback strategy. Output: adoption guide and phased rollout checklist.

packets.title: Hardening review and release readiness
packets.scope: Run end-to-end hardening pass for security, performance, and developer ergonomics; finalize release checklist. Output: release readiness report with residual risks and next actions.
